channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: JBL’s Rad Clip-On Bluetooth Speaker Is $20 Off
item.description: Take this unique speaker on your next adventure, and save some cash in the process.

item.title: AI Models Get Brain Rot, Too
item.description: A new study shows that feeding large language models low-quality, high-engagement content from social media lowers their cognitive abilities.

item.title: Tinder Launches Mandatory Facial Verification to Weed Out Bots and Scammers
item.description: Face Check will scan new members’ faces to ensure they don’t match existing profiles. The move comes as romance scams continue to proliferate, with bi...

item.title: Why Cohere’s ex-AI research lead is betting against the scaling race
item.description: Cohere's former VP of AI research, Sara Hooker, is launching a new startup to build AI models that can adapt to their environment.

item.title: OpenAI requested memorial attendee list in ChatGPT suicide lawsuit
item.description: The new information comes as the Raines family updated its lawsuit against OpenAI. The family first filed a wrongful death suit against OpenAI in Augu...

item.title: Snapchat makes its first open prompt AI Lens available for free in the US
item.description: Snapchat is expanding access to its AI-powered “Imagine Lens,” allowing all users to generate and edit images with custom prompts for free.

item.title: Our Favorite High Resolution Mirrorless Camera Is $900 Off Right Now
item.description: We found two outstanding camera deals, including one on Sony’s A7R V at the lowest price it’s ever been.

item.title: Tesla’s record sales quarter barely boosted profit
item.description: Tesla's profit actually fell 37% compared to the same period last year, despite buyers rushing to take advantage of the expiring EV tax credit.

item.title: No, ICE (Probably) Didn’t Buy Guided Missile Warheads
item.description: A federal contracting database lists an ICE payment for $61,218 with the payment code for “guided missile warheads and explosive components.” But it a...

item.title: OpenAI’s Atlas is more about ChatGPT than the web
item.description: OpenAI's new browser is a surface for the company to distribute ChatGPT and develop new AI features rather than improving core web experience.
